spell.name: Blade Ward
entries: You extend your hand and trace a sigil of warding in the air. Until the end of your next turn, you have resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At 5th Level
entries: You can cast this spell on a creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At 11th Level
entries: You can ignore the verbal component of the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At 17th Level
entries: When you cast this spell on another creature, you also gain its benefits.

spell.name: Animate Magic
entries: A magical effect is transformed into a being of living magic, an animate spell. Choose a spell effect of 6th level or higher within range. That spell ends, and an animate spell is formed in a space of your choice within range of the spell. The animate spell is of a school according to the effect you targeted. For example, if you targeted an evocation spell with this spell, you would create a {@creature living evocation|TPK}. You cannot command the animate spell, which is an independent creature beyond your control, though it is initially friendly to you and your allies.

spell.name: Candy Blast
entries: Invocas un puñado de caramelos duros (dulces hervidos, mentas, gominolas, etc.) y los arrojas a un objetivo que puedas ver dentro del alcance. Haz una tirada de ataque con hechizos a distancia. Con un golpe, el objetivo sufre {@damage 1d8} de daño contundente y el espacio en el que se encuentra, hasta un cuadrado de 5 pies, se convierte en terreno difícil hasta que una criatura usa una acción para recoger los dulces caídos. El caramelo producido por este hechizo es comestible, pero no tiene valor nutricional.
El daño de este hechizo aumenta en 1d8 cuando alcanzas el nivel 5 ({@damage 2d8}), el nivel 11 ({@damage 3d8}) y el nivel 17 ({@damage 4d8}).

spell.name: Candy Splash
entries: You hurl a bubble of candy caramel. Choose one creature you can see within range, or choose two creatures you can see within range that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

spell.name: Aid

components.m: a tiny strip of white cloth

entries: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd.
